function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Identification of unknown pneumonia cases in Wuhan, China in December 2019","Impact":"Global spread of the virus leading to a public health emergency of international concern","Mitigation":"Early detection, isolation, treatment of infected cases, and contact tracing","Technologies":"Diagnostic testing, contact tracing apps, isolation facilities","People":"Population of Wuhan, China, global population","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare professionals"},{"Description":"Announcement of coronavirus outbreak as a public health emergency of international concern","Impact":"Increased focus on early detection, isolation, treatment, and social distancing measures","Mitigation":"Implementation of early detection measures, isolation and treatment protocols, and social distancing measures","Technologies":"Diagnostic testing, isolation facilities, contact tracing apps","People":"Global population","Owner":"Public health authorities, governments, healthcare professionals"},{"Description":"Elevation of the UK's public health risk level from 'very low' to 'low'","Impact":"Increased awareness and preparedness for the virus outbreak","Mitigation":"Public health advisories, early detection measures, quarantine protocols","Technologies":"Public health communication technologies, diagnostic testing","People":"UK population","Owner":"Public health authorities, government"}]}
